QuestData.Title: Darkcloud Grimtotem
QuestData.Description: There's no way around it. If you want to win a battle, you have to spill some blood. In this case... a lot of it.$B$BYou know what we have to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 20 Grimtotem Tauren at Darkcloud Pinnacle.
QuestData.RewardText: That put a dent in their numbers! Can't say that they didn't deserve it.
